text:
Good idea. Fancy having a look at OAuth 1 and see if it mentions anything regarding the structure of client keys and secrets? If not we could "backport" the OAuth 2 version for later use in OAuth 1 provider. If there is then we might want to move them to each respective versions specific utils module.

FYI: using sets for the test might be a good idea here, something like 

```
self.assertEqual(len(set(generated) - set(allowed)), 0)
```
